title: React-Portfolio
role: Student, University of Oregon Full Stack Bootcamp
description: The portfolio website you are currently viewing was built and designed by me from scratch. The current build of this website is a Single-Page application built using React, with BootStrap styling elements provided through the ReactStrap Node Package.

title: QuoteGoat
role: Student, University of Oregon Full Stack Bootcamp
description: Productivity focused Social Accountability Platform for developers, featuring a database for user metrics over time, and Social Network features. Authenticated by and information obtained through Octokit by Github.

title: Day Tripper
description: Collaborative Playlist Web Application, allowing a user with Spotify Premium to host an event playlist. Guests of the event can access the playlist, and add songs to the queue without needing a Spotify account. Built and operated without requiring a back-end server.

title: Burger
role: Student, University of Oregon Full Stack Bootcamp
description: Time Management oriented Media Management Application providing users the ability to manage their media backlog. Users can access and prioritize selections from a vast library of Movies, TV Shows, Games and Books, for which we provide estimated completion times.

title: WeatherChecker
description: In this News Stand Web Application, users may request a web-crawl of up-to-date articles from NPR's News Website. After crawling through the current articles, images, titles and links are saved to a Mongo Database, and user's may save comments on the articles.

title: Student Quiz
description: This React-based web-game challenges your ability to memorize your recent choices. This game utilizes dynamic component architecture and object-oriented programming to shuffle the displayed options in real time, and keep you on your toes.

title: Back Logger
description: This full-stack web app, a pre-cursor to the Featured Project 'Timely', allows users to manage a database containing a media backlog. The application utilizes Object Relational Mapping (ORM) to manage its SQL Functions.

title: Password Generator
description: Movie Pals is a demo Full-Stack web app that serves up a movie-preference questionnaire, and uses an algorithm to match them with past users whose tastes align well with their own.

title: Fantasy Shop
description: This Fantasy Shop is a command-line based interactive shop like those you might find in an old-school text adventure. Take on the role of either customer or manager and use simple-to-execute commands to make changes to a SQL database directly from your terminal.
